edge: Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai is a soundtrack album released on December 13, 2001.
Sajid–Wajid are the music composers of Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album.
Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album is released under the label TIPS Jhankaar Beatz.
Alka Yagnik is a female singer in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album, and her songs are "Dil Ki Nazar Mein (Female)" and "Pehli Pehli Baar Hai"
Kumar Sanu is a male singer in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album, and his songs are "Dil Ki Nazar Mein (Male)" and "Sochoon Tumhein"
Sonu Nigam is a male singer in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album, and his songs are "O Mahive" and "Pehli Pehli Baar Hai" (with Alka Yagnik)
K.K. Is a female singer in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album, and her song is "Pehli Pehli Baar Hai" (with Alka Yagnik and Sonu Nigam)
Sunidhi Chauhan is a female singer in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album, and her song is "Dil Pe Chaane Laga"
Babul Supriyo is a male singer in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album, and his song is "Meri Tarah Tum Bhi" (with Alka Yagnik)
Iqbal is a male singer in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album, and his song is "Chahtoon Kee Duniya (Qawali)"
Afzal is a male singer in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album, and his song is "Chahtoon Kee Duniya (Qawali)"
Jalees Rashid is the lyricist of "Dil Ki Nazar Mein (Female)" in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album.
Ajay Jhingran is the lyricist of "Dil Pe Chaane Laga" in Kya Yehi Pyaar Hai soundtrack album.
